EmailTemplate.description: Email - Y&P Signed Non-Responsive Cunningham Bounds
EmailTemplate.name: Email - Y&P Signed Non-Responsive Cunningham Bounds
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT- {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} Case Update - Young & Partners, LLP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Customer.FirstName},
You previously signed our retainer agreement to have a further look at your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case . Our prosecuting firm has been unable to reach you and it's crucial you contact them if you want to pursue potentially getting a cash settlement. If you can please reach out to Karen Hyde with Cunningham Bounds Law at 251-471-6191 x128 they need to speak with you to further the case.
All the best, Young & Partners Law 1-888-463-0699
